document_data.name: Wood
document_data.mainbody: '''Wood''' was one of the ''five'' [[Element|elemental building blocks of matter]], according to the sages of [[Kara-Tur]]. It was fundamentally tied to nature. The [[House of Nature]], one of the planes in the [[World Tree cosmology]], was said to contain [[Wood element creature|animals composed of the element wood]].
document_data.Magic: In the magical traditions of the east, wood was one of the five elements over which [[wu jen]] could obtain mastery. For example, the [[Elemental aura (spell)|''elemental aura'' spell]], when cast by a wu jen, could protect against attacks from wooden weapons or from living plants.
